title: Beef nachos
description: Nachos are the perfect dish for a casual supper with friends. These beef nachos are flavoursome, quick to make and are bound to impress guests.

method.Step 1: In a dry pan, toast the chilli flakes, coriander and cumin for 1 minute. Remove.

method.Step 2: Heat the vegetable oil in the pan and brown the beef mince.

method.Step 3: Stir in the tomato purée, garlic and the toasted spices, then cook for 2 minutes. Pour over the water and simmer for 10 minutes.

method.Step 4: Add the black beans, drained and rinsed, and cook for 5 minutes. Add the lime juice and coriander leaves. Spoon over tortilla chips, top with the cheese, then grill until melted. Serve with chopped avocado and more cheese.
